figure_1.title: Fig 1. Flow diagram for the scoping review process adapted from PRISMA-ScR [36, 37].

claims.sentence:
This scoping review did not formally assess the quality of the included methodological studies [44], since the review’s main focus was not on the quality of the included studies’ findings but on the methods used.Results
Fig 1 shows a summary of the search and retrieval results.
